name: Karmic Night
description:
Even in Death, You Are Not Alone… 

Play as a ghost helping her family survive the night from the spirit of a killer. Roam the family cabin to undo dangerous sabotages, calm family members with your comforting presence, and hide the bodies of the deceased to ensure the survival of the rest.

Brought to you by PolyDuckStudios:

Nathan Lacsamana, Tim Kashani, Zoi Meaders
